criteria: All PRs must pass: Linting, Unit Tests (>80% coverage), and Security Scan (no critical vulnerabilities).
success_metrics: PRs are blocked on failure; quality metrics are reported on SonarQube.

criteria: All E2E tests passing in Staging; Performance benchmarks met for critical APIs; No P1 or P2 bugs in the release candidate.
bypass_criteria: Explicit sign-off from Head of Engineering with documented risk acceptance.
success_metrics: Successful and stable deployment to production with no immediate rollbacks.
